mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment (user_id, board_id, comment, created_by, updated_by) VALUES(#{userId}, #{boardId}, #{content}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy})
mapper.select: SELECT bc.id, bc.comment, bc.created_at, bc.created_by, bc.updated_at, bc.updated_by, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as writer FROM board_comment bc, user u WHERE bc.user_id = u.id ORDER BY bc.id DESC

SELECT bc.id, bc.comment, bc.created_at, bc.created_by, bc.updated_at, bc.updated_by, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as writer FROM board_comment bc, user u WHERE bc.board_id = #{boardId} AND bc.user_id = u.id ORDER BY bc.id DESC LIMIT 15 OFFSET #{offset}
